properties.areaDesc: Flat Tops; Elkhead and Park Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 8 at 2:08PM MST until February 10 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches
with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph
this evening, then decreasing overnight.

* WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains and Flat Tops.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to midnight MST Sunday night.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. A detailed map of
the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT MST SUNDAY NIGHT
